completion.item: <[!CDATA[Adds a selection listener on the tabfolderParameters: gara.jswt.SelectionListener listener - the desired listener to be added to this tabfolderThrows: TypeError - if the listener is not an instance SelectionListener ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns the client area off that tabfolderReturns: the client area node ]]>

<[!CDATA[Gets a specified item with a zero-related indexParameters: int index - the zero-related indexThrows: gara.OutOfBoundsException - if the index does not live within this tabfolderReturns: the item ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns the amount of the items in the tabfolderReturns: the amount ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns an array with all the items in the tabfolderReturns: the array with the items ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns an array with the items which are currently selected in the tabfolderReturns: an array with items ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns the zero-related index of the selected item or -1 if there is no item selectedReturns: the index of the selected item ]]>

<[!CDATA[Looks for the index of a specified itemParameters: gara.jswt.TabItem item - the item for the indexThrows: gara.jswt.ItemNotExistsException - if the item does not exist in this tabfolderTypeError - if the item is not a TabItemReturns: the index of the specified item ]]>

<[!CDATA[Removes a selection listener from this tabfolderParameters: gara.jswt.SelectionListener listener - the listener to remove from this tabfolderThrows: TypeError - if the listener is not an instance SelectionListener ]]>

<[!CDATA[Selects the item at the given zero-related index in the tabfolder. Sets the tabfolders selection the the given array. Depends on the parameterParameters: mixed arg - the given zero-related index or the given arrayThrows: gara.OutOfBoundsException - when there is no item for the given index ]]>
